thread.title: Andrew Jenkins

author: Andrew Jenkins
title: Andrew Jenkins
text:
I have cushion syndrome, because I fight it every step of the way it's restricted to my stomach rather than all over, my shape is extremely awkward, massive stomach but inshape everywhere else, so off the rack is never going to fit, typically I'm swimming in the top half and look like an over stuffed blood sausage on the bottom.
Itailor allows me to design a shirt from over 3000 combinations and provide my exact measurements, taking to account all the quirks of my body.
For my first order I choose from the fabric of the week(£26.99 inc p&p), just in case the finish/fabric was poor, this is £10 cheaper than their normal fabrics.
Today I received my first shirt, the quality of the fabric and finish are on a par with designer shirts I've paid over £100 in the past and it fits perfectly, I am really over the moon with it, so much so I'm about to order 3 more.
